static_content.question: Will you serve mostly static content (e.g., HTML, images, assets)?

api_backend.question: Do you need a backend API that clients or other services will call?
suggested_answers: Core of the product is an API

user_authentication.question: Will users need to sign up and log in?

multi_tenancy.question: Is this system for a single customer or many customers (multi-tenant SaaS)?

file_storage.question: Do users upload or store files (images, videos, docs)?

realtime_updates.question: Do you need realtime updates (e.g., live dashboards, notifications, WebSockets)?

messaging_queue.question: Do you expect background processing or asynchronous workflows that need queues?
suggested_answers: Heavy use of queues and async processing

scheduled_jobs.question: Do you need scheduled or cron-like jobs?

payments.question: Does the system handle payments, subscriptions, or financial transactions?

search.question: Do you need full-text search or complex search/filtering?
suggested_answers: Advanced search with relevance and filters

admin_dashboard.question: Will you need an internal admin panel or back-office dashboard?

mobile_clients.question: Will native mobile apps (iOS/Android) be first-class clients?

third_party_integrations.question: Do you require integrations with third-party systems (CRM, billing, identity, etc.)?

stateful.question: Does your system need to store user or business data over time?

primary_data_model.question: What best describes your main data model?

data_volume.question: How much data do you expect to store in the next 12 months?

data_growth_rate.question: How fast do you expect your stored data to grow?

data_sensitivity.question: How sensitive is the data you handle?
suggested_answers: Medium (basic personal data like names and emails)
High (financial, health, or other regulated data)

data_residency_required.question: Do you have strict data residency requirements (must stay in a certain country/region)?
suggested_answers: Legally required to stay in specific region

backup_retention_days.question: How long do you need to keep backups?

estimated_mau.question: Approximately how many monthly active users do you expect?

peak_rps.question: What is your expected peak request rate (across all users)?

traffic_pattern.question: How does your traffic typically behave?

performance_sensitivity.question: How sensitive is your application to response times?

burstiness.question: Do you expect sudden bursts of traffic (e.g., campaigns, sales, launches)?

availability_target.question: What availability (uptime) target do you need?

recovery_time_objective.question: If there is an outage, how quickly must the system be back up (RTO)?

recovery_point_objective.question: How much data loss can you tolerate in a disaster (RPO)?

multi_region_required.question: Do you require active multi-region setup for higher resilience or locality?

authentication_strength.question: What level of authentication strength do you need?

authorization_complexity.question: How complex are your access control needs?

regulatory_compliance.question: Do you need to comply with any specific regulations?

security_posture.question: How strict should your security posture be?

observability_level.question: How deep do you want logging, metrics, and tracing?

deployment_frequency.question: How often do you expect to deploy changes?

change_risk_tolerance.question: How much risk can you tolerate when deploying changes?

ops_team_maturity.question: How mature is your DevOps/SRE capability?

primary_region_hint.question: Where are most of your end users located, or which region do you prefer?

provider_lock_in_sensitivity.question: How concerned are you about being locked into a single cloud provider?

ops_model.question: Do you prefer serverless, managed services, or Kubernetes-style control?

managed_db_preference.question: Do you prefer fully managed databases or are you okay managing your own?

kubernetes_required.question: Is running Kubernetes (e.g., EKS/AKS/GKE) a hard requirement for you?

domain_fintech.question: Is this a financial or fintech-related system (e.g., payments, trading, banking)?

domain_healthcare.question: Is this a healthcare or medical-related system (e.g., patient data, diagnostics)?

domain_iot.question: Will you connect and manage physical devices or sensors (IoT)?

domain_gaming.question: Is this a game backend or gaming-related platform?

domain_ml_heavy.question: Does your system rely heavily on machine learning (training or serving models)?

domain_internal_it.question: Is this primarily an internal IT/business tool rather than a public-facing product?

web_ui.question: Will there be a web user interface?

mobile_apps.question: Are native mobile apps part of the solution?

public_api.question: Will you expose a public API for external developers or clients?

cost_sensitivity.question: How important is minimizing cloud cost versus performance and flexibility?

project_lifetime.question: How long do you expect this project or system to live?
